snippet: Arsenal striker Lucas Perez will miss Saturday's Premier League game against Sunderland after picking up an injury against Reading in the League Cup on Tuesday, according to a source at the club....

headline.main: Arsenal Striker Perez to Miss Sunderland Game
headline.print_headline: Arsenal Striker Perez to Miss Sunderland Game

lead_paragraph: Arsenal striker Lucas Perez will miss Saturday's Premier League game against Sunderland after picking up an injury against Reading in the League Cup on Tuesday, according to a source at the club.

snippet: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola heaped praise on Juergen Klopp, saying his Liverpool counterpart was the best when it comes to instilling an attacking style of play at a club....
lead_paragraph: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola heaped praise on Juergen Klopp, saying his Liverpool counterpart was the best when it comes to instilling an attacking style of play at a club.

snippet: Talismanic West Ham United midfielder Dimitri Payet has been granted extra time off to help the Frenchman recapture the scintillating form he displayed last season and to help cope with the Premier League's demanding festive schedule....

headline.main: Payet Handed Extra Rest in Bid to Recapture Best Form
headline.print_headline: Payet Handed Extra Rest in Bid to Recapture Best Form

lead_paragraph: Talismanic West Ham United midfielder Dimitri Payet has been granted extra time off to help the Frenchman recapture the scintillating form he displayed last season and to help cope with the Premier League's demanding festive schedule.

snippet: Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho is unlikely to give any first-team players a rest during the hectic festive schedule as he tries to keep his side in touch with the Premier League leaders....

headline.main: Mourinho Not Planning to Rotate Man United Squad
headline.print_headline: Mourinho Not Planning to Rotate Man United Squad

lead_paragraph: Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho is unlikely to give any first-team players a rest during the hectic festive schedule as he tries to keep his side in touch with the Premier League leaders.

snippet: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola finds nothing abnormal in his team's 2-0 defeat at Tottenham Hotspur but wants the side to learn from Sunday's loss and put their Premier League campaign back on track....

headline.main: Man City Must Learn From Defeat by Spurs-Guardiola
headline.print_headline: Man City Must Learn From Defeat by Spurs-Guardiola

lead_paragraph: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola finds nothing abnormal in his team's 2-0 defeat at Tottenham Hotspur but wants the side to learn from Sunday's loss and put their Premier League campaign back on track.

snippet: Brazilian midfielder Ramires has joined Chinese club Jiangsu Suning from Premier League champions Chelsea, becoming the latest high-profile player to make the switch to the cash-rich Super League....

headline.main: Chelsea Midfielder Ramires Joins China's Jiangsu Suning
headline.print_headline: Chelsea Midfielder Ramires Joins China's Jiangsu Suning

lead_paragraph: Brazilian midfielder Ramires has joined Chinese club Jiangsu Suning from Premier League champions Chelsea, becoming the latest high-profile player to make the switch to the cash-rich Super League.

snippet: Liverpool centre back Joel Matip has returned to full training, handing manager Juergen Klopp a welcome fitness boost ahead of Sunday's Premier League visit of West Ham United....

headline.main: Liverpool's Matip Back in Full Training Ahead of West Ham Visit
headline.print_headline: Liverpool's Matip Back in Full Training Ahead of West Ham Visit

lead_paragraph: Liverpool centre back Joel Matip has returned to full training, handing manager Juergen Klopp a welcome fitness boost ahead of Sunday's Premier League visit of West Ham United.

snippet: Henrikh Mkhitaryan underlined his growing importance to Manchester United by scoring in a 1-0 win over Tottenham on Sunday, sealing the team's third Premier League victory since August....

headline.main: Mkhitaryan Scores, Gets Hurt as Man United Beats Spurs 1-0
headline.print_headline: Mkhitaryan Scores, Gets Hurt as Man United Beats Spurs 1-0

lead_paragraph: Henrikh Mkhitaryan underlined his growing importance to Manchester United by scoring in a 1-0 win over Tottenham on Sunday, sealing the team's third Premier League victory since August.

snippet: - Tottenham Hotspur's Christian Eriksen scored twice in a 3-0 victory over Hull City on Wednesday, as Mike Phelan's struggling side fell to their 10th defeat in 16 Premier League games this season....

headline.main: Eriksen Shines as Spurs Hammer Hapless Hull 3-0
headline.print_headline: Eriksen Shines as Spurs Hammer Hapless Hull 3-0

lead_paragraph: - Tottenham Hotspur's Christian Eriksen scored twice in a 3-0 victory over Hull City on Wednesday, as Mike Phelan's struggling side fell to their 10th defeat in 16 Premier League games this season.

snippet: Arsenal will look to recover from their midweek Champions League defeat at home to Barcelona with a Premier League victory over Manchester United at Old Trafford on Sunday, defender Per Mertesacker said....

headline.main: Mertesacker Gunning for Quick Recovery at Old Trafford
headline.print_headline: Mertesacker Gunning for Quick Recovery at Old Trafford

lead_paragraph: Arsenal will look to recover from their midweek Champions League defeat at home to Barcelona with a Premier League victory over Manchester United at Old Trafford on Sunday, defender Per Mertesacker said.
